text_intro:
Welcome, Outlander!
You arrived at your destination: a desert island. Your grandfather gave you the coordinates of this placa but unfortunately couldn't tell more information. It is up to you to find the treasure.

places.name: beach
places.text: You are standing on a sandy beach.

interactables.name: sand
interactables.text_place: You see something shiny in the sand.
interactables.text_place_taken: You see regular beach sand around you.
interactables.text_look: As you look closely you find a machete in the sand.
interactables.text_look_taken: It's just sand. I don't have time to build a sand castle.

interactables.name: bottle
interactables.information: What goes all the way around the world but ...
interactables.text_place: There is a bottle in the sand. It seems like it contains something.
interactables.text_place_taken: There is an empty bottle in the sand.
interactables.text_look: As you look closely you find a paper in the bottle. There is something written on it. You write it down in your notes.
interactables.text_look_taken: You added the text to you notes. You don't need the bottle anymore.

adjacent_places.name: jungle
adjacent_places.text: There is a path leading to the jungle.

places.name: jungle
places.text: As you enter the jungle you find yourself at an entirely different place. Though you are not far from the beach you can't here the sound of waves anymore. Instead you hear different animals from the deep jungle. This island is not deserted at all, leastwise by animals.

interactables.name: plants
interactables.text_place: The plants are very dense on your left. It's very likely that they are covering something.
interactables.text_place_taken: There are plants everywhere around you.
interactables.text_look: There is something behind the plants but you can't get any closer because it's too dense.
interactables.text_look_taken: Now you see cleary, the stone lies there with the carvings in it.
interactables.text_unlock: You find a big stone behind the plants. It has some text carved in it. You write it down in your notes.

adjacent_places.name: beach
adjacent_places.text: The beach where your journey started.

adjacent_places.name: house
adjacent_places.text: An old house. It seems no one has been around for ages.

places.name: house
places.text: You are standing in a very old wooden house. There are dust and old used stuff everywhere. It seems like no one has been here for ages.

items.name: hat
items.text: An old hat hanged on a coat stand.

items.name: shovel
items.text: A rusty shovel leaning against the wall.

interactables.name: door
interactables.text_place: There's a strange door on your right.
interactables.text_place_taken: There is nothing interesting here anymore.
interactables.text_item: The big treasure your grandfather told you.
interactables.text_look: This door has a very unique lock. It's a mechanic lock and you need give it a password.
interactables.text_look_taken: The door is open, the treasure has been found.
interactables.text_unlock:
With many clicking and sliding sounds the door slowly opens. You are very happy to realize that the treasure you've been seeking is behind the door.
Congratulations! You are finished with CLI Adventures Beta version.
To be continued...

adjacent_places.name: jungle
adjacent_places.text: You barely see through the dense plants.
